statements: SELECT * FROM authorized_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM authorized_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM authorized_users ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM authorized_users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, password FROM authorized_users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT username, access_level FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM authorized_users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM authorized_users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM access_levels WHERE level_id = 3;
SELECT level_id, level_name, description FROM access_levels;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level, password FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, password, access_level FROM authorized_users ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT username, access_levels.level_name, access_levels.description FROM authorized_users JOIN access_levels ON authorized_users.access_level = access_levels.level_id;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND access_level < 3;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users;
SELECT username, access_level FROM authorized_users;
SELECT system_name, location FROM smart_home_systems;
SELECT user_id, system_id, access_time FROM access_logs;
SELECT user_id, system_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT system_name, location FROM smart_home_systems WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT user_id, system_name, access_time FROM authorized_users JOIN access_logs ON authorized_users.user_id = access_logs.user_id WHERE access_logs.access_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, password FROM authorized_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT system_name, COUNT(log_id) AS total_access FROM smart_home_systems JOIN access_logs ON smart_home_systems.system_id = access_logs.system_id GROUP BY system_name;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT username, access_level FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT system_name, system_ip_address FROM smart_home_systems WHERE system_ip_address LIKE '192.%';
SELECT user_id, system_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_access_rights WHERE user_id = 2 AND system_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT system_name, system_ip_address FROM smart_home_systems ORDER BY system_name ASC;

SELECT username, system_name, access_time FROM authorized_users JOIN user_access_rights ON authorized_users.user_id = user_access_rights.user_id JOIN access_logs ON user_access_rights.system_id = access_logs.system_id WHERE access_logs.access_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(system_id) AS num_systems FROM user_access_rights GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_systems >= 2;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM authorized_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM authorized_users INNER JOIN user_devices ON authorized_users.user_id = user_devices.user_id;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM authentication_logs ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT username, access_level FROM authorized_users WHERE access_level = 1 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat' AND location = 'Living Room';
SELECT username, login_time, logout_time FROM authorized_users INNER JOIN authentication_logs ON authorized_users.user_id = authentication_logs.user_id WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT a.username, b.level_name FROM authorized_users a INNER JOIN access_levels b ON a.access_level = b.level_id ORDER BY a.user_id ASC;
